) function handleEditAvatarClick () { const popupAvatarEdit = document.querySelector('.popup__avatar-edit'); popupAvatarEdit.classList.add('popup_is-opened'); } function handleEditProfileClick () { const popupInfo = document.querySelector('.popup__info'); popupInfo.classList.add('popup_is-opened'); } function handleAddPlaceClick () { const popupAddImage = document.querySelector('.popup__add-image'); popupAddImage.classList.add('popup_is-opened'); } } export default Main;
